menu_deck_linchpin_desc: The Linchpin is the quiet constant that holds a crew together when everything starts to fall apart. Not a boss nor a bruiser, the Linchpin thrives in the thick of the action, reading the room and reinforcing the people around them. When a job goes sideways, the Linchpin is the one keeping everyone sharp, steady, and alive. Stick close to them, and the crew becomes more than the sum of its parts.
menu_deck_linchpin_1_desc:
You and your crew (henceforth "crew members") may gain Cohesion stacks. Cohesion stacks tend to a number equal to $perk_value_1 times the amount of crew members nearby for each crew member, but only as long as they are within #{skill_color}#$perk_value_2## of you and you are not downed. This means that if their Cohesion stacks are below this amount, they gain #{skill_color}#$perk_value_3## Cohesion stack every second, but lose #{important_1}#$perk_value_4## Cohesion stacks every second otherwise. This tendency grows faster the farther away a crew member's Cohesion stacks are from the target amount.
Crew members lose #{important_1}#$perk_value_5## Cohesion stack for every #{skill_color}#$perk_value_6## damage taken, with health damage weighed doubly.

#{risk}#NOTE: Card benefits do not stack if multiple Linchpin users select the same, and Cohesion stacks are not gained faster from multiple Linchpin users nearby. If multiple Linchpin users near one another have would have their Cohesion stacks tend to different amount, the higher one wins.##

Your dodge is increased by #{skill_color}#$perk_value_7## points.
menu_deck_linchpin_1_short: Crew members may gain Cohesion stacks. Cohesion stacks tend to a number equal to $perk_value_1 times the amount of crew members nearby for each crew member, but only as long as they are within #{skill_color}#$perk_value_2## of you and you are not downed. Crew members lose #{important_1}#$perk_value_5## Cohesion stack for every #{skill_color}#$perk_value_6## damage taken, with health damage weighed doubly. Your dodge is increased by #{skill_color}#$perk_value_7## points.
menu_deck_linchpin_1_1_desc: Healing that crew members receive is #{skill_color}#$perk_value_1## more potent for every 8 stacks of Cohesion they have.
menu_deck_linchpin_1_2_desc: Crew members' dodge metres fill up by #{skill_color}#$perk_value_1## of their dodge every second.
menu_deck_linchpin_3_desc: Crew members' dodge is increased by #{skill_color}#$perk_value_1## points for every 8 stacks of Cohesion they have.
menu_deck_linchpin_3_1_desc: For the purposes of benefits from this perk deck, you are always treated #{skill_color}#as if you had $perk_value_1 more stacks of Cohesion than you actually have.##
menu_deck_linchpin_3_2_desc:
The amount of Cohesion stacks you gain from proximity to crew members is increased by #{skill_color}#$perk_value_1.##
The amount of Cohesion stacks you lose from the lack of proximity or being downed is reduced by #{skill_color}#$perk_value_2.##
menu_deck_linchpin_5_desc: Your dodge is increased by #{skill_color}#$perk_value_1## points.
menu_deck_linchpin_5_1_desc: Crew members gain a #{skill_color}#$perk_value_1## movement speed bonus for every 8 stacks of Cohesion they have.
menu_deck_linchpin_5_2_desc: Crew members gain a #{skill_color}#$perk_value_1## reload speed bonus for every 8 stacks of Cohesion they have.
menu_deck_linchpin_7_desc: Crew members' dodge is increased by an additional #{skill_color}#$perk_value_1## points for every 8 stacks of Cohesion they have.
menu_deck_linchpin_7_1_desc: You gain #{skill_color}#$perk_value_1## Cohesion stacks when you are revived.
menu_deck_linchpin_7_2_desc:
You and any crew members nearby gain #{skill_color}#$perk_value_1## Cohesion stack for every #{skill_color}#$perk_value_2## kill(s) you perform.
This effect stacks with other Linchpin users who have this card selected.

#{risk}#NOTE: Cohesion stacks gained this way cannot increase a crew members' Cohesion stacks beyond the amount it would tend to normally.##
menu_deck_linchpin_7_2_short: You and any crew members nearby gain #{skill_color}#$perk_value_1## Cohesion stack for every #{skill_color}#$perk_value_2## kill(s) you perform.
menu_deck_linchpin_9_desc:
Crew members' Cohesion stacks now tend to #{skill_color}#$perk_value_1 + $perk_value_2 times the amount of crew members nearby.##

Deck Completion Bonus: Your chance of getting a higher quality item during a PAYDAY is increased by #{skill_color}#10%.##
menu_deck_linchpin_9_1_desc:
Crew members now only lose stacks for every #{skill_color}#$perk_value_1## damage taken.
Additionally, crew members regain #{skill_color}#$perk_value_2## health every $perk_value_3 seconds for every 8 stacks of Cohesion they have.
menu_deck_linchpin_9_2_desc:
Crew members regenerate armour #{skill_color}#$perk_value_1## faster for every 8 stacks of Cohesion they have.
In addition, crew members' dodge metres fill up by #{skill_color}#$perk_value_2## of their dodge every second.
menu_deck_linchpin_9_3_desc:
Crew members' stamina regenerates #{skill_color}#$perk_value_1## faster for every 8 stacks of Cohesion they have.
Additionally, the benefits from Keep Moving! (Card 5, Choice 1) and Shoot and Scoot! (Card 5, Choice 2) increase to #{skill_color}#$perk_value_2## per 8 stacks of Cohesion.
menu_deck_linchpin_9_4_desc:
Crew members gain #{skill_color}#$perk_value_1## Cohesion stack for every #{skill_color}#$perk_value_2## kills they or a crew member nearby performs.
Kills are tracked separately for each crew member.

Unlike Earn Your Keep! (Card 7, Choice 2), this can go past what the amount each crew member's Cohesion stacks would tend to.
menu_deck_linchpin_9_4_short: Crew members gain #{skill_color}#$perk_value_1## Cohesion stack for every #{skill_color}#$perk_value_2## kills they or a crew member nearby performs.
